body.name: NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC Stepping Stones for Kids – Durable Non-Slip Stones Encourage Toddler Balance & Gross Motor Skills, Indoor & Outdoor Toys, Balance Stones, Obstacle Course (Amazon Exclusive)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 44 mins
features: 10 DURABLE, NON-SLIP STONES - Includes 10 durable plastic stepping stones in 6 bright colors! Perfect for kids 3+ and up to 150 lbs., they can be used indoors or for kids outdoor play. These active sensory toys promote coordination skills & balance!

DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM SAFETY – Each stone has a non-slip rubber base and textured stepping surface for enhanced safety. Kids can focus on their balance and coordination as they safely jump from stone to stone and navigate their obstacle course.

RUGGED, STACKABLE DESIGN - A rugged design makes these stones ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. They also stack easily for storage or transport, so they can be used at home, the park, daycare, or anywhere else kids enjoy active play!

SPINNER GAME INCLUDED - Kids can use the included spinner to create fun games with their stepping stones! Just set them up in a challenging configuration, spin the dial, and jump to the color it lands on for an imaginative, active style of play!

DEVELOP BALANCE & COORDINATION - Toddlers and kids can develop their balance, coordination, and gross motor skills through active play with these stones. They also encourage physical education and provide hours of screen-free fun!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: National Geographic 10-Piece Toddler Stepping Stones Set The National Geographic 10-Piece Toddler Balance Stepping Stones set includes 10 colorful plastic stones. Perfect for kids 3+, they can be used indoors or for kids outdoor play. They’re great active sensory toys that promote coordination skills and balance! A spinner is included to create fun games!

Watch your kids learn balance and other motor skills as they jump to each stone! National Geographic Balance Stepping Stones for Kids are the perfect indoor or outdoor activity, promoting imaginative play and helping kids develop balance, motor skills, and coordination. These hard-plastic stones are durable, safe, and easy to transport and store thanks to their non-slip rubber base and rugged, stackable design. This set includes 10 stepping stones in 6 bright colors. National Geographic Stepping Stones add an active element to play dates, birthday parties, and more, and inspire hours of active, screen-free fun! For extra fun, a spinner is included so kids can set up their stones in different configurations, then jump to the color they land on. It makes for creative play as kids develop their own rules and games. Expand your child's balancing skills and create a new obstacle playground every day with National Geographic Stepping Stones. Order today! We make the highest quality hands-on science toys, and all products are backed by exceptional service. With a mission to inspire people to care about the planet, the National Geographic Society is one of the world’s largest nonprofit scientific and educational organizations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great project to use to develop balance and have fun while doing. The rubber on bottom prevents slipping and safe to use on hardwood floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Indoor/Outdoor Activity
reviews.reviewText: A perfect activity for children to build core strength and work on their balance. These were suggested to us by our physical therapist for cystic fibrosis and they are a great addition to our son's daily activity. The color spinner is also a good addition. VERY durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great gift for my grandkids, very sturdy, strong colors, fun game

reviews.reviewText: Fun for inside and outside. (not slippery)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for many stages!
reviews.reviewText: Keeps my 1.5 & 4 yr old occupied! They can both move them around & enjoy stepping on them. They seem sturdy. The rubber bottom grips well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product, high quality, works and looks exactly as described …. Would 100 percent recommend ordering from this seller anytime

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for family time!
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for indoor or outdoor. The rubber around the bottom makes it nonslip and it truly is nonslip. It had the whole family playing together racing to the different colors when we spun the wheel. My 4 and 2 year old love playing floor is lava and creating obstacle courses. Perfect gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 y/o loves them
reviews.reviewText: I love it for sensory activities and you can play tons of different games with them.

What a creative way to reinforce colours while increasing balance in little ones. My 3 year old nephew knew exactly what to do with them and used them to play "the floor is lava" while using the spinner to morlve between colours. His 1 year old sister tried to join in walking from one stone to the next great for developing balance safely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: She and her best friend currently screeching as they play this game. They LOVE it. It's great quality and totally non slip on our slippery floors. My daughter is 5 and just loves it. Would thoroughly recommend to anyone. Great value for money too.

Sturdy, colourful, easy to get out/pack away. We used it for a kids party and 4-5 yo were happily using them as they have similar ones at their daycare. Stones are not that big, so might not be the best option for older kids. great addition to playing "floor is lava" :)
Sturdy and durable. Our toddler (4) loves these. And I see them being used well into the next few years. They stack small. Easy to store and travel.

reviews.reviewText: My 3 year old grandson loves playing with this toy
